import React from 'react' import img from '../pic/zara1.jpeg' const item = [ { id: 1, className: 'item', pic: img, title: 'Item-1', text: 'High-waisted linen blend Bermuda shorts. Front dart. Front pockets and back pockets with mock flaps. Fastens with a zipper at the front, fastens at the', price: '25#', buy: 'buy' }, { id: 2, className: 'item', pic: img, title: 'item-2', text: 'High-waisted linen blend Bermuda shorts. Front dart. Front pockets and back pockets with mock flaps. Fastens with a zipper at the front, fastens at the', price: '45$', buy: 'buy' }, { id: 3, className: 'item', pic: img, title: 'item-3', text: 'High-waisted linen blend Bermuda shorts. Front dart. Front pockets and back pockets with mock flaps. Fastens with a zipper at the front, fastens at the', price: '39.99$', buy: 'buy' } ] const Items = () => { return ( <>
{ item.map(({id, pic, className, title, buy, text, price}) => (

{title}

{text}

{price}
)) }
) } export default Items
